name: Tanner
ability: EOTA (end of the age): draw 3 cards.  Choose one to add to demand.  Put the rest on the bottom of the deck(s).
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): If there are any cards, draw a card then discard.

name: Bakery
ability: EOTA (end of the age): earn 1g from a player who does not produce food.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): If there are any cards, draw a card then discard.

name: Mentor
ability: On your turn, you may peek at one face-down business.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): If there are any cards, draw a card then discard.

name: Hunter
ability: If you played an event as your action, you may play another event.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): If there are any cards, draw a card then discard.

name: Council
ability: When taking a contract, you may place it on another business which provides as many resources.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): If there are any cards, draw a card then discard.

name: Farmer
ability: AAA (as an action): gain 2g from Farmer.  When Farmer is opened, place 8g on it.  When discarded, discard the gold.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): If there are any cards, draw a card then discard.

name: Skinner
ability: AAA (as an action): Discard a card from your hand and gain 1g.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): If there are any cards, draw a card then discard.

name: Guard
ability: Place 3g here.  Whenever someone else opens a business, gain one of these.  Obsoleted by swords.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): If there are any cards, draw a card then discard.

name: Gatherer
ability: You do not pay taxes.  When you play an event, pay 1g to treasury.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of total weapons contracted.

name: Scribe
ability: When opening a business, pay 1 less gold.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of total weapons contracted.

name: Shoemaker
ability: When opened: You may play an event as a free action.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of total weapons contracted.

name: Tanner
ability: EOTA (end of the age): draw 3 cards from the discard pile.  Choose one to add to demand.  Put the rest on the bottom of the discard pile.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of total weapons contracted.

name: Warrior
ability: AAA (as an action): replace the bottom demand card with one in your hand.  Obsoleted by swords.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of total weapons contracted.

name: Trapper
ability: If you trigger an event with food demand, gain 1g.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of total weapons contracted.

name: Hunter
ability: If you played an event as your action, you may play another event.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of total weapons contracted.

name: Prophet
ability: Once per turn, you may examine the top card of the draw deck.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of total weapons contracted.

name: Mediator
ability: If the demand pile is at least as big as the event pile, this contract is worth 2g.  Otherwise, 1g.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Skinner
ability: AAA (as an action): Discard a card from your hand and gain 1g.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Warrior
ability: AAA (as an action): replace the bottom demand card with one in your hand.  Obsoleted by swords.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Powerbroker
ability: When discarding development cards, you may pay treasury 1g to add one to the demand pile.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Archivist
ability: When you would draw, you may draw the top card of the discard pile instead.  This ability ends after age III.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Guard
ability: Place 3g here.  Whenever someone else opens a business, gain one of these.  Obsoleted by swords.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Apothecary
ability: When you play an event as your action, draw a card.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Shoemaker
ability: When opened: You may play an event as a free action.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Alchemist
ability: Place 2 cards from the next age under Alchemist without looking at them.  When you would draw a card, draw one of these instead.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Shaman
ability: When you play an event, you may decide not to evaluate the current event.  It still goes to the demand pile.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Fruit Monger
ability: EOTA (end of the age): If this does not have a contract, take 1g from the supply.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Thug
ability: Gain 1g whenever “Barbarians” events resolve.  Obsoleted by swords.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Merchant
ability: When you claim a contract, gain 1g.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Trapper
ability: If you trigger an event with food demand, gain 1g.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Hut Builder
ability: Selling a business is a free action.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Hut Builder
ability: Selling a business is a free action.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Astrologer
ability: When sold, draw 2.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Baker
ability: EOTA (end of the age): earn 1g from a player who does not produce food.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Thug
ability: Gain 1g whenever “Barbarians” events resolve.  Obsoleted by swords.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Prophet
ability: Once per turn, you may examine the top card of the draw deck.
effect: Players providing hides: +1g

name: Quarry
ability: EOTA (end of the age): draw a card.  You may develop once per turn as a free action.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card for each science you provide.

name: Bank
ability: When the treasury runs out of money, gain 2g.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card for each science you provide.

name: Armory
ability: Your draw limit is increased by 1.  Obsoleted by rifles.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Lodge
ability: When you start a business, you may discard Lodge, return Lodge’s contract card to demand, and open the business immediately.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Tower
ability: Whenever you play an event, gain 1g.  Obsoleted by rifles.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Inn
ability: EOTA (end of the age): you may take an extra turn.
effect: If there is food in the demand pile, -1 population.

name: Spear Maker
ability: When opened, you may put the bottom demand card as a contract on any business.  Obsoleted by rifles.
effect: Each player discards 1 business and returns its contract card to the demand pile.

name: Temple
ability: When you trigger an event (before it resolves), you may draw a card and discard.
effect: Players gain 1g per hide they provide.

name: Mercenary
ability: Before “Barbarians” events resolve, gain 2g from the treasury.  Obsoleted by rifles.
effect: Players gain 2g per stone they provide.

name: Hay Maker
ability: EOTA (end of the age): draw a card.  You may play one event per turn as a free action.
effect: Players gain 2g per stone they provide.

name: Laboratory
ability: When science is added to the demand pile, gain 2g for each science demand already there.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Orchard
ability: EOTA (end of the age): If you provide more food than anyone, gain 2g.
effect: Treasury -1g for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Trade Post
ability: For each other business you have when this is opened, gain 1g.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card and you may place a card in the demand pile.

name: Market
ability: Each turn you may treat one food provision as any resource for contracting purposes.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card and you may place a card in the demand pile.

name: Bronze Mine
ability: When opened, place 7g here.  Gain 1 of these on each turn.  When this business is contracted, remove remaining gold.
effect: Treasury -2g for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Castle
ability: To open, you must first discard a stone business and return its contract to the demand pile.
effect: Treasury -2g for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Knighthood
ability: When you play an event, you may place it under the top event.  You may examine it before deciding.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Bladesmith
ability: You gain 1/2 the gold stolen by “Barbarians” events (round down).
effect: If there is food in the demand pile, -1 population.

name: Bookstore
ability: You may return one contract to the demand pile each turn.
effect: If contracted weapon count exceeds demand size: +1 population and treasury +6g.

name: Workshop
ability: After starting a business, draw a card.
effect: Treasury +5g

name: Dairy Farm
ability: You may start one business per turn as a free action.
effect: Discard the bottom-most card from the demand pile.

name: Warehouse
ability: When opened, draw a card.  Your draw limit is increased by 2.
effect: Players gain +2g per bronze they provide.

name: Hospital
ability: When taking a contract, you may treat one happiness demand as any resource.
effect: Players gain +2g per bronze they provide.

name: Butcher
ability: When opened, you may add a card from your hand to the demand pile.
effect: Treasury -2g for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Clothier
ability: When opened, gain 1g for each type of resource you provide.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): you may contract any business using the top card of the discard pile.

name: Grocer
ability: To open, you must first discard a food business and return its contract to the demand pile.
effect: Each player gains 3g per science they provide.

name: Pawn Shop
ability: When a hide, stone, or bronze is placed in the demand pile, gain 2g.
effect: Treasury -2g for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Cotton Mill
ability: On each turn, you may add one card to the demand pile from your hand.
effect: Treasury -2g for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Monastery
ability: When drawing at the end of your turn, you may draw the bottom card of the demand pile.
effect: Players gain 3g per food they provide.

name: Accountant
ability: Your contract payouts are increased by 1.
effect: If contracted weapon count exceeds demand size: +1 population and treasury +6g.

name: Cafe
ability: When opened, play one free action for every two food you provide (including Cafe).
effect: Treasury +8g

name: Gunsmith
ability: EOTA (end of the age): pay Gunsmith’s contract from the treasury as you would during payouts.  It remains “paid” during payouts.
effect: Players gain 3g per cloth they provide.

name: Security
ability: EOTA (end of the age): earn 2g from a player with fewer weapons.
effect: Treasury +8g

name: Gravedigger
ability: When opened, add two cards of your choice from the discard pile to the demand pile.
effect: Treasury loses 20g, reduced 5-3-2g per happiness provided by players (2p-3p-4p).

name: Museum
ability: When opened, draw the top two cards of the discard pile.
effect: Open, uncontracted businesses earn 3g each.

name: University
ability: When opened, return the development cards to your hand.
effect: Deal the top two cards from the discard pile onto the demand pile.
